title: Bug 2120: MRU File List not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The bug report describes an issue with the MRU (Most Recently Used) file list not being persisted between sessions. The OB (Observed Behavior) statement mentions that files do not appear in the File menu MRU list when they should be persisted between sessions. The SR (Steps to Reproduce) statement is not provided in the bug report. Additionally, the wording of the existing statements can be improved for clarity.
OB: The MRU file list does not retain files between sessions. Files that were previously opened do not appear in the File menu MRU list when the application is restarted.
